attributes.action: Overstayers and illegal immigrants; new law needed.
attributes.additional_details: We call upon the government to urgently review the present ineffective handling of overstayers and illegal immigrants.At the moment a passpot is required by the offender to be removed from the U.K.  All too often these are destroyed by them to then be released and continue to stay here illegally. And despite unenforceble requests to report to authorities on a weekly basis most just disappear..again.Therfore the action we want the government to take is to remove all offenders from the U.K. with or without a passport,without any delays.
